ICTAK Learner Tracker

ICTAK (Information & Communication Technology Academy of Kerala) learner tracker app is designed to help learners keep track of their progress and achievements in various courses and certifications offered by ICTAK. ICTAK is a joint initiative by the government of Kerala and leading tech giants in the industry.

ICTAK
